<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collaboration-spaces/{spaceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a collaboration space by ID. Allowed if the client either owns it or is a collaborator.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"The ID of the requested collaboration space."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
